reference.shortdesc: Use the lcInstructornote2 element to provide information or notes you want to provide to the course instructor. These notes can be conditionalized out of content you intend to deliver to the learner. This element replaces the lcInstructornote element in DITA 1.2.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock:
Introduction

If you need an introduction, you would include it here.

You can have notes, tables, all kinds of things like that here, if you desire. You can provide tips for instructors in an instructor note, like this one.
